title: i love this game with my heart and soul <3
text:
BUT the past two days there have been people hacking nearly every game I‚Äôve joined, rendering it almost unplayable. Either they leave all players dead instantly as soon as you get in to the dropship/launchpad/cafeteria. Or they hack the Host‚Äôs account and say vulgar/off the wall things without the host even typing said things out. (This happened to me when I was Host.) Another issue with a hacked game that I‚Äôve run into is the task bar being COMPLETELY FULL when I know for a fact I‚Äôve only done one or two tasks.. and so have the other Crewmates... because the game has only been going for 20 seconds. It is so frustrating and it makes me want to throw my phone out of the window when I encounter it.  I understand this may be a hard issue to fix. I don‚Äôt play any videos games besides my old Guitar Hero & Rock Band on XBox but I‚Äôm sure people hack in to all the popular games nowadays. Is there any steps we can take to prevent this from happening??? Why do people do this?? It takes all of the fun out of this amazing game. 
Sincerely, a girl who got Covid-19 and spent all of her quarantine playing this game for 15+ hours at a time.

title: The update ruined it.
text:
‚ÄúIf it isn‚Äôt broken, don‚Äôt fix it.‚Äù
If only Among Us had followed this philosophy. Before the update, Among Us was constantly discussed and multiple of my friends suggested that I download it. Once downloaded, I quickly realized that the game was amazing! It was a mystery game that you play with REAL PEOPLE!! It was interesting, fun and entertaining. Now, after the update, it‚Äôs hard to navigate, frustrating and way less fun. The ‚Äúaccount‚Äù rule is glitchy as my Apple ID won‚Äôt let me create an account and without an account you can‚Äôt choose your name. The other thing is the chat. Although people were able to say inappropriate things on the chat before the update, you have the option to filter out curse words. Now, the chat is hard to work with and you aren‚Äôt able to communicate what you want to by the time the clock has run out. And, now that there is only a number of things you can say, it‚Äôs very likely that you‚Äôre playing with bots. The social interaction was probably the best part of the game. It used to be a five star game, now it‚Äôs probably a two or three. I will give it three stars because it used to be amazing. Honestly, Among Us creators, you should just undo the changes.

title: Oh god
text: OK listen I loved the game so much. Till they added quick chat. Quick chat just makes the game even more confusing it limits what you get to say. I know the editors of this game probably thought it was a smart idea because people were being mean and saying swearwords to each other but it‚Äôs a really bad idea because, it is more confusing than when I first got this game. I would love it if they removed the quick chat. And plus people are entering the game with their name as ‚Äúme‚Äù or ‚Äúi‚Äù to beat the System. So you see the system of quick chat is pretty flawed, specially if there‚Äôs a new player in the game that doesn‚Äôt even know how to chat. When this update first came in I was excited until I found out all the things that I would have to learn it was more confusing than a second grader taking a 12th grade math test. So please remove this feature and go back to the original state. Plus if people were being mean with swearwords people have the option if they didn‚Äôt want to see swearwords or if they wanted to. How about you add an account feature where you can make an account to have friends maybe a while-playing chat feature. Please take some of these ideas into consideration because the game is so big. Thank you and have a good day.

title: Great game but sucky parts to it
text: It now punishes you for purposefully disconnecting... except it still lets people change the number of imposters after the room is made and it still lets you filter by number of imposters so now when I try to find a room with only one imposter and they change it at the last possible moment I get punished for no longer wanting to play that game. If I search by number of imposter I shouldn't have to sit there and monitor if that changes or risk getting punished. Why bother having that filter if it does essentially nothing for you? Also to report players it will only let you push confirm if you don‚Äôt select why you‚Äôre reporting them. Another problem if the room owner leaves the room and you become the owner of the room it leaves the settings which is usually fine until next time you want to make your own room and now all your settings are changed even if you didn‚Äôt play a round as room owner. And there really should be a quick vs casual mode so people don‚Äôt have to go through 20 rooms just to find one that has voting or discussion time less than 2 minutes sometimes they‚Äôre even 5 minutes.

title: Love it...but a few problems
text:
Please read this, Innersloth!!!

Among Us is overall a great game. I love the concept and how you go about doing your tasks. But, there are a few things that need help. I would have given this game a 5 star review, but the new chat feature is strait out AWFUL. I get why they were doing this, but I don‚Äôt this was the best way to do it. We already know for a fact that Among Us can detect when someone has said an inappropriate word, because of the censored chat feature. Yes, I know the censored chat has a few bugs, like censoring things that shouldn‚Äôt be censored, but with a little bit more work, it could work flawlessly. Now, take that censored chat, and instead of just censoring it, kick out the person who would have been censored, that way, if someone says something bad, they get kicked out of the game. I like the time out feature, which also comes into play. With enough times of getting kicked for saying bad things, they get into a time out. Now, everyone can play with the regular chat and only the ones who say inappropriate things will get kicked.

Sorry for the really long review, but I think that this would really work! Please read this, Innersloth!

title: So Glitchy
text:
The game has become virtually unplayable after the update. The limitations on chat are frustrating and take all the fun out of gameplay. Might as well not talk at all! I used to play for at least an hour a day and maybe longer on weekends, but now I find myself quitting after a game or two because I‚Äôm so frustrated with the new gameplay. With multiple imposters, the game is almost impossible without a conversational chat function. My favorite feature ( connecting with other players socially) has been nerfed. I guess I‚Äôll go back to playing solitaire ü•≤

I‚Äôm also having an issue where the joystick feature/movement function gets stuck after meetings, and I have to toggle touch on and off to be able to move again. Super annoying and another great reason to just play something else, I suppose. It‚Äôs a shame, because the developers really had lightning in a bottle before. 

I just don‚Äôt understand the reasoning behind making the game less fun. Create better AI to monitor in-game chats and automatically eject bad actors from the game. Force people to connect the game to their Google or Facebook account to play to track them. I think other games have found some ways around this. Or have 12 and under rooms and adult rooms. At this point, a savvy competitor will steal the primary concepts and convert your players‚Äîout they‚Äôll all go back to Minecraft. Your choice!

title: Unlawful and Coercive Data Practices
text: I open the app after a several month hiatus, and discover that there are new ‚Äúdata policies‚Äù which means that they are spying on us and endangering MY data. They supposedly have an option to ‚Äúmanage data practices‚Äù and the button looks like it exists‚Ä¶ but that button DOES NOT WORK. You are coerced and forced to click ‚ÄúI accept/understand‚Äù but you cannot actually manage your data options. Because they do not want you to do that. This is the ‚ÄúGreat Reset‚Äù sheitanist methodology as used by Google and the rest. You ‚Äúadvise and inform‚Äù your slaves and subjects about what will happen, but they get no choice in it. That is why they offer you a button written ‚ÄúI understand,‚Äù instead of ‚ÄúI accept‚Ä¶‚Äù because it doesn‚Äôt matter if you accept! They are going to do it to you anyway even if you refuse them permission. They ‚Äúadvise then dominate.‚Äù If we disagreed they would tell us more about what they will abusively do to us, but nothing would change or they would ‚Äúpunish‚Äù us for rejecting their abusive terms ‚Ä¶. Usually by denying you service! Very democrat. I AM NOT ABLE TO PLAY, because I refuse to simple ‚Äúaccept/understand‚Äù the new information stealing policy before managing the options and refusing permissions. Innersloth created a NONFUNCTIONAL ‚Äúmanage options‚Äù button to force us without a choice. BOOO!

title: The Updates
text: Everything is fine except for the updates. i hate that just because i‚Äôm under the age of 18 i‚Äôm not able to. actually use the chat. It‚Äôs very hard to actually defend myself or to help catch the imposter because i‚Äôm not able to actually type something out. This defeats the whole purpose of the game if I‚Äôm not able to defend myself. It just takes the fun out of playing. If anything it‚Äôs just irritating. Instead,  would suggest that we sensor harmful words instead of just doing away with the option to chat. Not to mention that just because i‚Äôm not the age or over the age of 18, means that I‚Äôm being punished for someone else‚Äôs doing and abuse of power. I didn‚Äôt do anything. A lot of people didn‚Äôt do anything. Not only that but people over the age of 18 could abuse the fact of the chat as well. If that‚Äôs the case then we might as well just get rid of the chat all together. But again, that defeats the whole purpose of the game. In my opinion I think that the most reasonable thing to do is to sensor harmful phrases or sentences all together so people under the age of 18 can have the experience of actually being able to contribute and play the game as well. Because i‚Äôm almost certain minors are the ones who are mostly playing the game.

title: Updated with a few concerns
text:
I really like Among Us. Or, well, I used to. I was seriously obsessed with it. So much so I wrote a positive review calling out complaints. And now, weirdly enough, I stand with those complaints. 
But if I stand with them, why am I rating this  three whole stars? 
I really like the game. It is fun, well made, and complicated but in a good way. There are so many interesting things you can do, so many clever plays and fun pathways. 
Okay, so if I love the game so much, what are these complaints I speak of?
Well friend, I happen to have iOS 12.4 installed, and I can‚Äôt play the Airship. And EVERYONE is playing the Airship. Now, this may seem like a petty statement, but hear me out. Everyone is focused on the exciting new map, which I totally get. I‚Äôve watched too many Airship live-streams to be healthy. But this means not enough attention will be focused on the games hosted on other maps. Especially inappropriate games. The vast amount of games given sexual names is astounding and horrifying. Put a better detection system or something in place, because I cannot go to the app and see no less than five inappropriate names. It infuriates me to think this was rated 9+. Please re-evaluate the safety measures in place right now.

title: INNERSLOTH BETTER READ THIS
text: I hope you read this entire thing or else you will not get the point I‚Äôm trying to get to with you.  üò°üò°üò°üò°üò°My favorite game was among us.  I would play in the car while we went somewhere, I would play when I had a break from dance, I would even play it on the toilet but then there was this update.  THE QUICK CHAT IS THE MOST STUPID THING YOU COULD HAVE DONE!üò°üò°üò°. The airship is a nice fun update but THE QUICK CHAT ISNT.  Whenever I see someone who kill in the cams I run out of there into the room where the imposter killed in or to the emergency meeting button to call a meeting.  I try to type but noooo I have to use quick chat. üò° So when I enter the quick chat there is nothing there that says I saw so and so killed on cams. So when I just tell them who to vote they always vote me because I don‚Äôt have a reason why to vote that person out of the game.  The report button is nice because I can report mean people but now I can‚Äôt vote them out of the game I‚Äôm playing so I have to leave the game if I don‚Äôt want to be bullied or to hear somebody else bullied. If you could please take back the update of the quick chat and let us talk how we want to would be AMAZING!  Also add back the vote to kick people off button. Thank you very much and PLEASE DO IT!

title: Amazing Game, Room For Progress
text: I love this game a lot. It‚Äôs really fun, and an amazing game to play with friends. However, something that a lot of people have been wanting is the ability to have friends. Like maybe, you could have the ability at the end of the game to make a friend request to someone? That way you could play with people you just met and live playing with. Also, it could be really cool if you made a chat just fir the imposters, because one time in a game, I had a secret ally who never reported, and then the other imposter killed them. So maybe it would be cool if you could chat to other imposters privately. However, if you are looking to install this game, then you should do it! It‚Äôs really fun! And, if your scared of bad words, among us has a sensor that will get rid of them. This is at really fun game, and you will make a lot of new friends on here. ( maybe even keep them if they include friending people? ) Anyways, have fun playing!!!! You will LOVE it!!!!! Also, one last thing, I think it would be really helpful for a voice chat, so then when people do curse, I can play annoying my little pony songs over them. Thank you!

title: Amazing Game but...
text:
I love this game. It‚Äôs a lot like Murder Mystery, however instead of running around trying to find the murderer, the innocents have other stuff to do as well, like tasks and fixing sabotages. And the murderers (impostors) have more stuff they can do then kill. They close doors on you, and sabotage the ship. You can also join friends online and chat through a chat box that DOES have a sensor chat option. 
My only problems are that the usernames don‚Äôt have much restrictions, and many people join with inappropriate usernames. You also have online predators or people giving their number out. And one of the main problems are hackers. They join games and mess it up for everyone, killing people easily, controlling people, or shutting down the game so we have to find a different server. 
Otherwise, it‚Äôs a very fun game. You can‚Äôt trust anyone, not even your own friends. Some people FaceTime each other, or use discord to talk, which can be annoying because people go ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs blue, cuz my friend died, we‚Äôre talking in rl.‚Äù And then everyone gets upset because he‚Äôs ruining the game. To those people who do that KINDLY AVOID DOING THIS. 
Thank you!

title: Awesome game, but‚Ä¶
text:
First off, I want to say that this game is one of the best I‚Äôve played in my life. The new features of shapeshifting, being an engineer or scientist, being able to pay for new stuff with ‚Äòbeans‚Äô, all of that is really cool. However, I took away one star for issues with the game itself. Please hear me out. My app keeps kicking me out of rooms and/or the game itself. I wouldn't complain if it was only the one device or all my apps, but both of my devices with this app will not let me play normally, which is really inconvenient when I‚Äôm trying to play with friends. I have checked my internet, restarted my devices, deleted the app on BOTH devices and then reinstalled it, signed back into my account, and the issues started happening again. It just won‚Äôt stop, and it‚Äôs only this game. Nothing else. Could you please look into this? I‚Äôve already read through other reviews that were left recently, and it looks like other people are having this problem too.
Other than my issues, I think this game is wonderful and exciting, and I would definitely recommend it to others. Thanks for reading this through

title: SUPER ADDICTING! WOULD RECOMMEND‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
text:
I just wanna start off by saying that I was really skeptical of this game at first. It seemed like just another fad. But for anyone considering downloading, please listen. This game is really fun and it‚Äôs one of the best feelings for me when I find out who the imposter is (without dying, obv). After school, I open the game and it‚Äôs a great stress reliever for me. I invite friends to play with me, and make new friends in some games. 

To the designers (if you‚Äôre reading this): I just have one problem. When you become a ghost, you can no longer vote. I agree that you shouldn‚Äôt be able to vote if you die because you know who the imposter is. However, I think it would be nice to be able to vote if you get voted out, because you still don‚Äôt know who the imposter is. If you get voted out, I think you should still be able to chat, but up to a limit. For example, you can only type 10 messages in the chat each meeting when you get voted out. I‚Äôm not trying to force you guys into anything, just a few thoughts of mine.
Hope this helps anyone considering downloading!üíï

title: Superb
text: All in all, this is a very fun game. As a crewmate, you really get the feeling someone could kill you at any interval, and as an imposter, it‚Äôs fun to try staying undercover, and amusing to see how badly the crewmates screw up. Hide N‚Äô Seek is particularly fun, because the whole ‚Äúcould get killed‚Äù thing is amplified by TEN. There is no ‚Äúthis guy is safe,‚Äù there is no ‚Äúwe can partner up,‚Äù there is only ‚ÄúRUN RUN RUN!‚Äù The music is fire, too, and is an excellent fit, making it even better. There‚Äôs just one thing: on the roadmap, apparently improved matchmaking is upcoming, right? Well, I think we REALLY need that soon, because there are still people like me at level 50 being paired with Level 3s. I hope it‚Äôll be level-sorting, because at the moment, a public lobby is literal nuts because nobody knows what they‚Äôre doing. If that matchmaking comes soon, the people at the bottom can learn how to play properly, and the people at the top can enjoy themselves. However, this is still a very good game, and gets that much better every update. Don‚Äôt listen to the one-stars, go ahead and get this game, it‚Äôs worth it!

title: I like the upcoming updates
text: So I looked at the YT vid for the upcoming updates for among us and I really like the fact that there are going to be more roles other than crew mate and imposter, but I also have a few ideas. Idea #1, so I‚Äôve noticed that all the roles that will be coming out are all crew mate roles, maybe you could add a few imposter roles (but still keep the max amount of imposters 3) like an imposter who could drag the bodies around the map or an imposter on the side of the crew mate (it‚Äôs a crew mate role yet it has the same abilities as an imposter but it doesn‚Äôt know who the imposters are). Idea #2, maybe there could be a crew mate role like a mechanic that can fix a sabotage instantly but can only do it once per game/meeting, or a crew mate that could block the vents so the imposters can‚Äôt go to/go in the vent but it resets after every meeting and they can only do it once per meeting. Idea #3 Maybe you could add onto the skeld and Mira Hq maps because they can‚Äôt hold the new 15 players but the polus map most likely could be able to do the 15 players. But these are just suggestions, you don‚Äôt have to use these ideas, but you can get inspiration from them.

title: Can‚Äôt play airship map
text: I‚Äôll start out by saying I love among us. I love the new update that lets you have access to the skins, and that we can buy stuff without actual cash. However, every time I am in an Airship game and it‚Äôs about to start, I GET KICKED OUT OF THE APP. This happens every time I try to play an Airship game so because of it I haven‚Äôt been able to play on the Airship for a couple of months. I don‚Äôt know why this is happening but it‚Äôs not confined to one device only, it happens on my iPad as well. But for some reason it works on my computer. Also sometimes when I try to join a game, on ANY map, only a few lobbies pop up although I am positive there are more.  Whenever I join the one game I can find I GET KICKED OUT OF THE APP. PLEASE DO SOMETHING!!! I I‚Äôve tried on my phone, my iPad, and it never worked but on my computer it did. Why won‚Äôt it work on my mobile device?!? Please help!! I want to play Airship!! Please see my review! Please fix the game! I‚Äôve tried everything I can but I JUST CANT PLAY! I rate it 5 stars so you might see my review although with this glitch I think it only deserves 4.

title: Would‚Äôve given this 5 stars if it wasn‚Äôt for new update
text: Used to love among us and would have given 5 stars. Love the new maps and them updating the game adding new things to still make it interesting for the players. HOWEVER, after this new recent update I‚Äôm missing over half of my paid items (I did my account log in correctly I have half of my items just not the other half somehow-lost paid pets, paid christmas hats, and free halloween hats that Ive always had in my inventory previously.) My biggest complaint would be how if your wifi or the game kicks you out or disconnects you without you wanting to be disconnected, the game now penalizes you for the game kicking you out by saying ‚Äúyou cannot play for 70 minutes after intentionally disconnecting‚Äù. Please fix this issue. It‚Äôs not fair to penalize players from playing the game because either the game lagged and kicked them or their wifi crashed. Intentionally okay, but maybe give more than 1 warning before blocking a player from playing incase it was a wifi or system issue and not intentional or a smaller timed penalty for the first warning. Players might lose interest and stop playing altogether if the game keeps kicking us out for hours over a wifi disconnection happening one time.

title: Good, but many bugs.
text:
I play among us nearly every day, and it is a fun and entertaining game. But recently, the game has gotten repetitive and buggy. Polus map is corrupt, the cams don‚Äôt work and the ground is invisible, so it would be amazing if you could fix it. Hackers are a large problem as well. They always ruin the servers and accuse the impostor 2 seconds into the game. They also do visual tasks as impostors which is SUPER annoying, 
And they kill people during meetings. They gameplay over the past month has gotten mind numbingly repetitive. I wish there was a story mode where you could learn about how the impostors threatened the crewmates, and how you explore the maps doing missions. I also wish there was infinite mode, where you had to survive as a crewmate as long as possible in any map. And, finally, I would LOVE if there was currency, which could get you bonus outfits. You earn the currency by completing missions and tasks in story and infinite. It would also be cool if the Skeld had a lounge with activities you can do, like play guitar or computer or even play arcade games. So it would basically be a mini rec room. I hope some of these ideas get into the game. Thank you for reading!

title: It‚Äôs not that great
text: The game itself is alright. When I first got it, I was obsessed with it. But the game isn‚Äôt really that great. It‚Äôs not very fun. It‚Äôs very childish. The new update is awful. You have limited things you can say in the chat bar. This game is over rated I do not recommend. It is meant for 8 year olds. Also, the game glitches a lot. The little Martian people WHATEVER those people are, are stupid. I‚Äôm not trying to insult the creators of this game, but the game is really awful. I 100% do NOT recommend. Unless you 7-12. If your any older than that, I DO NOT RECOMMEND. Like I said, when I first got the game, I was obsessed. But really the game is really dumb and the plot of the game is stupid. I guess the game isn‚Äôt bad for being free, BUT, if you want more things you can dress up as, it costs money. It really isn‚Äôt a good game. WAY overrated. And most of the people who are playing the game, are weird and are inappropriate. I guess that‚Äôs why they made it limited what you can say in the chat bar. But you barely get to say anything. By ‚Äúlimited‚Äù I mean you can‚Äôt just type in the chat bar, there are options on what you get to say. For example, if I saw red vent, then I can‚Äôt say in the chat bar, RED! I have to choose one of the options. So dumb. It‚Äôs not worth you time installing. üòí

title: Love the game, but needs work.
text: The game concept is awesome, and probably one of the best mobile games out there, but it‚Äôs got a ways to go before being a finished product. First, the matchmaking experience is awful. It usually takes 10-20 attempts to get into a match that isn‚Äôt full or already started, and then if you don‚Äôt like the settings you have to do it all over again. On top of that, the ads after each match are TOO LONG!!! I get that the developers need to make a profit somehow, but anything over 15 seconds is problematic with the way the matchmaking is built. If you are the host, all of your players will usually be gone by the time you finish watching a 30 second ad, and if you‚Äôre not the host then you usually won‚Äôt be able to rejoin before the lobby gets full. The second thing that made me remove a star is the bugs and connection issues. This is extremely frustrating for a game that depends on people not leaving to be fun. Oftentimes when you finally get imposter, half the lobby will get disconnected and then the game is over. Where‚Äôs the fun in that? I love the game when it actually works, and I will add a star when each of these problems is fixed, but until then I don‚Äôt think this game is a finished product.

title: This game is great
text: So after four of my friends who play it recommended me to play it, I tried it out. At first I didn‚Äôt really get it because I never did the ‚Äòhow to play‚Äô thing, but I caught on fast. Basically their is the crew and the imposter. The imposter is trying to kill everyone on the crew to win. The crew is trying to fix the ship while trying to find the imposter and kick him of the ship. Once they do that, the imposter is dead and they win. But along the way, they have to report bodies which activate meetings so in a chat box they can discuss who is suspicious and who they think they should vote for. Or they could skip the vote if they don‚Äôt know who to vote for. They can also activate emergency meetings if they think they know who the imposter is. If the majority votes for any person, imposter or not imposter, that person is killed. If it‚Äôs the imposter, obviously they win. But if it‚Äôs a crew member that crew member can stay on the ship as a ghost and do tasks to fix the ship, or they can leave the game. That‚Äôs the game and I find it really fun and I don‚Äôt really have any complaints. Thanks for reading my review! üê¨

title: I LOVE this game
text:
it‚Äôs so much fun to play with friends! it‚Äôs better that you can customize the game and change it to be what you want. i just have one complaint. the single game mode can be boring sometimes. i would love to see other game modes like hide and seek or a death match mode. i‚Äôm going to assume you guys are probably working on this already but i do want more maps to explore and play. i really love this game and would recommend it to everyone!
(Edit)
so there is a new map but it‚Äôs not fair that you have to pay to play it. you shouldn‚Äôt have to pay to play a map it‚Äôs not fair for those who can‚Äôt afford or can‚Äôt buy the bundle. letting only people who pay play the new map isn‚Äôt fair for the rest because we want to experience it too. i didn‚Äôt wait for a new map just to find out i can‚Äôt play it. the pay thing really brings the quality of the game down too. you don‚Äôt see good games like Breath of the Wild making you pay to access a part of the map. it‚Äôs a really scummy way to make money like i get you need to make a profit but don‚Äôt just ruin the game for the majority. please change this. it really isn‚Äôt fair.

title: Great game! But needs more content
text: This game is great, and would definitely recommend to anybody who is interested. But there are some things that I think should be added just to improve the experience. 1. We need more maps. The map that is currently in the game is great, but there is no variety. It gets kind of stale when you are playing on the same map for an hour or two. 2. Add more jobs or stuff for the crew mates to do. The jobs are fine the way they are, but as a crewmate there seems to be nothing to do while playing. I would recommend added more jobs, making the jobs seem more minigame like,  or adding something else for the crew mates to do. 3. Add more cosmetics. It seems a bit weird to be asking for more cosmetics, but the cosmetics we have now don‚Äôt excite me. I want to see more fun and creative costumes in the game just to spice up the experience. 4. There should also be a friend system so you know when your friends are on and can join there game. 5. There needs to be a separate imposter chat so both imposters can communicate with each other. But anyways this game is great, and would definitely recommend :)

title: Why can‚Äôt I sign in?
text:
Hello I am a fellow person that was Interested in the game Among Us. Sadly this game doesn‚Äôt allow me to take away the feature of ‚Äúquick chat‚Äù, honestly I don‚Äôt see the point of this feature, and since it doesn‚Äôt solve any problems and ends up making more‚Ä¶ why should Among us have it. Truly all of my friends and youtubers play Among Us and it looks like a fun game but‚Ä¶(here‚Äôs a big but) I can‚Äôt chat with the people in game nor can I change my name and many more, (that I can‚Äôt think of because I never got to play the game.) I‚Äôve played this game before and I could chat and all in all it was fun (I played like 3 times‚Ä¶ but still fun,) but when I decided I wanted to give it a shot again I found out that I couldn‚Äôt chat! It was very alarming, you see I‚Äôve tried searching up reasons and answers of why that was happening but, I only found out it was impossible to delete this major issue. So I ultimately gave up on the game in general. Having a new update in a game is cool but, if it makes a problem why have the new feature. I think this game would be much better, would attract many more people, (and maybe I might have even liked the game,) if this feature were removed, and because of this feature I wish I could rate this game a 0.
Omg this happened to me twice!!!!!

title: Absolutely everything you could ever dream of
text: This game is legitŸ´ I love playing this game with my familyŸ´ and it's especially fun when I get the impostor roleŸ´ and I was originally going to give it a 4-star rating due to its problem where I can only type certain things (which is something that my cousin has) but that problem was somehow fixedŸ´ and I don't know whyŸ´ or even how that problem got fixedŸ´ but either wayŸ´ I am happy that that one was fixed Ÿ´ and I am excited that the airship map that came outŸ´ and I've been waiting for it to be  releasedŸ´ so if InnerSloth is reading thisŸ´ thanks so much for creating this game because it is so much fun. I also really like their update where they added new colors so that anybody who plays this game can choose from a bunch of different colors and not just choose from the old ones, I also like that they made it so whoever plays this game can play with 15 players, I also have a question for them, is there really going to be a submerged map, because I want to know if it was actually going to come out at some point.

title: Amazing game....but the update needs fixes immediately
text: Among us was one of my favorite games to play with friends before the update. We would play it all the time online, but because the creator did not allow the game to connect with most Apple ID, especially iPad, you could not make an account. I could not play unless my friends were right next to me and we played local, but that was a rare occurrence. I understand they make ‚Äòguest‚Äô mode on it now, but even then, it would not let you customize your name or type in the chat. You could only use the chat button update on the side, and that was super annoying too. It was like you had a limited dialogue. So in summary, I miss playing, and I tried to fix it for TWO HOURS, and looked it up several times, but apparently it is the developers issue, because over hundreds of people have written online on multiple websites that pop up right away on search, and even the people who know everything about computers admitted it‚Äôs not the Apple device‚Äôs or the Apple owner‚Äôs fault the game was made not so friendly for Apple ID. I wish they would fix this, but developers don‚Äôt usually care, so ya. For anyone who can make an account, the game is very fun though and I bet you‚Äôre allowed to type.

title: This is a great game, but.. :)
text: I love the simplicity and the stress and everything about this I just have a few suggestions. If and when a hacker has been recognized by the game ban them from the server and give them a warning, if they hack again, shut their game down COMPLETELY I mean don‚Äôt let them use the app at all, like if they open it it won‚Äôt even work. I also suggest more than a 100 character chat limit, it‚Äôs kinda long I know but it‚Äôs useful to talk with more than 100 characters per 2 minutes. The last thing I suggest is the ability to search for games with a certain name instead of having to scroll, this can cause friendships by being able to find a server with similar interests, it can have the same refresh type organization to it except the fact that you can look up certain names to find servers with similar names. This is a great game and this is just my opinion on what would make the game a lot more fun and active, this isn‚Äôt a need, or must, it‚Äôs just a friendly suggestion, meaning I don‚Äôt really plan on seeing these added since there are so many reviews. But if you do see this do take it in to consideration, thank you for your time.

title: The new chat update
text:
Hi Ive been playing among us since the middle of 2020 and I have enjoyed freely chatting with everyone and making new friends. I faked my age so I could chat freely, because my sister said it asked for her age. I hate this new update. Please take it away. Its now obvious to see who is over 18 or who had faked their age. The new feature is annoying because it takes so long to find what you need in all the categories. Everyone is so used to saying each others colors, But now you dont have that option. Please take the feature away. Its more boring and less fun to play. Ive spent money on this game and now I might quit. Please read this review and TAKE THE FEATURE AWAY. The polis map is really weird looking and annoying now. Also the glitching of when I try to sabotage or look at the map. I play on mobile so its really bad. title: Request
text: I would love to be able to make friends on this app,or atleast be able to have a setting where you can request sharing information to become real life friends with a particular person,as long as it isn‚Äôt inappropriate in any way lol,I meet many great people and I think I will continue to,so it‚Äôll be nice if I were able to further out connection. Also this probably is a bit much to ask, but do you think you could find our last game and that last people that played with us,since of course everyone would have a special type of character, a nickname and a username/former nickname under it(that can maybe be visible,so you can remember people that you played with),and then after maybe 1-3 games together,you can request to be even better friends.I think you should also be able to report an inappropriate exchange of information,and there should be a way to search up certain players,or report them(for scammers and information stealing hackers) .Thanks for looking at my request,and even if you don‚Äôt accept it,I still really love the game!Have a great day!-Noooooooooo(my name on Among us)

title: Read this;
text: Among us is an amazing game!  And look I‚Äôve read so many one star ratings look,  Innersloth is 3 people cut them some slack.  They just fixed the hacking.  And people who think it is Innersloth‚Äôs issue on getting kicked and banned from games well that is your issue, the owner of the game YOU joined decided they didn‚Äôt want you.  It is also not their fault if the game kicks you out you need at least a iPhone 6 + without it kicking you out I know it‚Äôs annoying but an iPhone 5 can‚Äôt support the game on some conditions.  It is also not their fault that your getting bullied,  just ignore the people!  If you know none of the stuff is true than don‚Äôt listen to them,  all they want is attention.  And it is also your choice if you want to be mature enough to deal with them or just leave! So let‚Äôs recap if you want to play this game and have a great time,  1; Be grateful that Innersloth fixed the hacks and don‚Äôt be needing, they are only three people!  2; At least try playing on a device that can support the game.  And 3;  Be mature.  That‚Äôs all I had to say just remember that what people say online isn‚Äôt always true.

title: Love the game but it is too buggy
text: Alright let me start with when ever I try to look for a match I get errors %98 of the time. When I am in the middle of a game I will randomly be kicked out and get a error message. And when I click on a match I mostly get a error that says it either is full or already started, basically what I‚Äôm saying is don‚Äôt show it on the list if I can‚Äôt join. Although I know the reasoning to most of these is that you didn‚Äôt design the game to run perfect because well you didn‚Äôt think it would be a popular game, well because this game is what 3 years old? Besides all the bugs this is a REALLY fun game. I even made a purchase in game. But if the game will not function correctly I don‚Äôt see the point in buying anything. And I am sure I‚Äôm not the only one that feels this way and had these problems. Please fix all the bugs, if you fix the issues then I will proceed to play this game more and purchase items. (Side note, it would be cool if you added more things to buy, like outfits, more pets etc. I don‚Äôt care what the cost is just please add it.) Thank you!
